text: A voiced bilabial implosive is a type of consonantal sound, used in some spoken languages. The symbol in the International Phonetic Alphabet that represents this sound is , and the equivalent X-SAMPA symbol is `b_<`. ==Features== Features of the voiced bilabial implosive: ==Occurrence== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="2" | Language !! Word !! IPA !! Meaning !!
